change-rep-widget.it-is-highly-advised-to-switch-to-a-diff: It is highly advised to switch to a different tribe, in order to improve security and decentralization of the Paw network.
change-rep-widget.rep-represents-you: {{ name }} represents you in the Nano consensus protocol by voting on your behalf.
change-rep-widget.switching-to-a-different-representative-: Switching to a different tribe could improve security and decentralization of the Paw network.

change-rep-widget.you-have-marked-this-representative-as-t: You have marked this tribe as trusted, meaning its status will remain "Good" even in case of severe issues with uptime or weight distribution.

advanced-security-features.1: Support for Ledger Nano S / Nano X hardware wallets
advanced-security-features.2: Ability to create multi-signature addresses where multiple private keys are required to access and transfer the funds
